author: Brian Turner
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Layer the bread in a small oven dish, greased with butter. Place the shallot, eggs, double cream and porcini into a bowl and mix together. Pour the cream mixture over the bread. Place the Pecorino on top of the bread and place into the oven to bake for 12 minutes, or until golden and cooked through. Remove from the oven and serve garnished with the chopped dill.
